name: Kathleen McDermott
what_you_do: Kathleen McDermott is a Certified Stress & Lifestyle Management Coach who helps women reduce stress, break generational cycles, and live authentically through various techniques including Restorative Yoga and Breathwork.
who_you_serve: She serves women, particularly those over 40, who are looking to manage stress and navigate mid-life changes.
current_projects: Offering complimentary coaching sessions and hosting the podcast 'Your Life Your Way'.
bio: Certified Stress & Lifestyle Management Coach with 19 years of experience, and host of the podcast 'Your Life Your Way'.
business_focus: Kathleen McDermott is a Certified Stress & Lifestyle Management Coach who helps women reduce stress, break generational cycles, and live authentically through various techniques including Restorative Yoga and Breathwork. (stress management)
audience_type: She serves women, particularly those over 40, who are looking to manage stress and navigate mid-life
